text:
Lock8 | Berlin, Germany | full-time ONSITE VISA

We are a [startup](http://lock8.me), building the hardware and software to enable bike sharing and bicycle fleet management. We have a cool and experienced team, good clients and things look great.

We are looking for a frontend engineer. Our stack is React and Flux, thereâ€™s a lot of visualisation and maps, which I think is fun.

Hit me at misha@lock8.me with your cover letter and link/CV.
